mbio.ncct.ont.util

Class PipelineUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • mbio.ncct.ont.util.PipelineUtil

  • public class PipelineUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the PipelineUtil class for utilities used in Pipeline.
    Author:
    Yan Zhou created on 2019/05/16

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • checkIlluminaReadsPrefixWithSampleSheet

        public java.lang.Boolean checkIlluminaReadsPrefixWithSampleSheet(java.lang.String sampleSheet,
                                                                 java.lang.String extension,
                                                                 java.io.File illuminaDirectory)
        Compares if the set of sample names in the sample sheet and the set of the prefixs of Illumina reads are the same.
        Parameters:
        sampleSheet - the path to the sample sheet.
        extension - the extension of the sample sheet file
        illuminaDirectory - the directory of Illumina reads.
        Returns:
        the boolean value if the two sets are the same.

      • getOntReadsPrefix

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getOntReadsPrefix(java.io.File ontDirectory)
        Gets all prefixes of ONT reads in a given directory.
        Parameters:
        ontDirectory - the path of ONT reads directory.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList contains all prefixes.

      • checkOntReadsPrefix

        public java.lang.Boolean checkOntReadsPrefix(java.io.File ontDirectory,
                                             java.io.File illuminaDirectory)
        Checks if the prefixes ONT reads are unique and if the set of Illumina prefixes contains all ONT reads prefixes.
        Parameters:
        ontDirectory - the path of ONT reads directory.
        illuminaDirectory - the path of Illumina reads directory.
        Returns:
        true if all prefixes ONT reads are unique and the set of Illumina prefixes contains all ONT reads prefixes.
